Made with recycled polyester, this lightweight underwear is not only stretchy and smooth, but boasts 90% recycled polyester for fabric that feels good and does good for the planet. This pair features moisture-wicking fabric to help keep you cool and dry while antimicrobial fabric helps fight odor. Plus, it's been enhanced with StayNew® technology to keep it looking and feeling new, wash after wash. The keyhole fly adds convenience while the tag-free design offers all-day comfort.

Wear them with a tee or tank top.
